images.copyright: American bison in Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming (© Gerald Corsi/Getty Images)
images.title: American goliaths go head-to-head
images.caption: American bison
images.desc: Although American bison live and defend themselves as a herd, these two don't appear to see eye to eye. With their massive heads, they're natural stand-ins for the helmeted human titans facing off in the stadium today for Super Bowl Sunday.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
